definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: Few data on air pollution exposure and risk of venous thrombosis are available.
sentences.chinese: 但是關於空氣污染與靜脈血栓關係的數據卻很有限。

sentences.english: Ammonia gas released byfertilizefertilized cropland is a cause of air pollution.
sentences.chinese: 被施過肥的農田釋放的氨氣是空氣污染的原因之一。

sentences.english: We don't take air pollution lightly, like you do.
sentences.chinese: 對待空氣污染，我們可不會像你們那樣等閒視之。

sentences.english: The likelihood of immediate reactions to indoor air pollutants depends on several factors.
sentences.chinese: 對室內空氣污染可能產生的即時反應取決於幾個因素。

sentences.english: The type of air pollution in Yinchuan is coal-burning pattern.
sentences.chinese: 銀川市空氣污染類型爲煤煙型污染。

sentences.english: A report published recently brings bad news about aire pollution.
sentences.chinese: 最近一項報告表明空氣污染狀況不容樂觀。

sentences.english: Air pollution in Chian is extremely serious, especially in cities with heavy industry.
sentences.chinese: 中國的空氣污染很嚴重，尤其在重工業城市中。

sentences.english: There is less air pollution in Sunshine Town than in other area of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 太陽城比北京其它地區空氣污染少。

sentences.english: Instead of high yield, however, they got water and air pollution.
sentences.chinese: 然而，沒有得到高產量，卻造成了水污染和空氣污染。

sentences.english: Last but, not least, we should try our best to prevent the air from being poluted.
sentences.chinese: 最後但同樣重要的是，我們要盡力防止空氣污染。

sentences.english: It has become more and more obvious that the air-pollution is getting heavier everyday.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼彩虹越來越少，是和空氣污染有關嗎？

sentences.english: It is urgent that the acute problem of air pollution in the city should be solved.
sentences.chinese: 該城市空氣污染這一嚴重問題急須解決。

sentences.english: Exhaust gas has been incriminated in air pollution in cities.
sentences.chinese: 廢氣已過視爲城市空氣污染的原因。

sentences.english: However, contaminated air is five times greater inside the home.
sentences.chinese: 不過，空氣污染的五倍大內家。

sentences.english: Check air pollution conditions several times a day.
sentences.chinese: 一天能查上好幾次空氣污染情況。

sentences.english: It also initiated its first-ever air pollution red alert mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 它還啓動了首個空氣污染紅色預警機制。

definition: to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
environment protection office/PRC National bureau of environmental protection
(of a pendulum) to stop swinging/(of work, production, activities etc) to come to a halt/to be suspended/to be canceled/shutdown/(sports) lockout
